markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Sphinx](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=209)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 250</row>

Sphinxes are a family of mystical beings that combine leonine, avian, and usually humanoid features. Though the most common sphinxes are famous on their own merits, the family includes other types of sphinxes as well.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Elder Sphinx](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1318) (Creature 16), [Hieracosphinx](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1317) (Creature 5), [Sphinx](/Monsters.aspx?ID=384) (Creature 8)
name: Sphinx
